channel.title: Assignments on COMP2521 Summer Fun
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on COMP2521 Summer Fun

item.title: Assignment Two - Fury of Dracula
item.description: Objectives to implement the engine and some AIs for a game to give you experience working in a team to give you further practice with C and data structures Ramblings Map Representing the map data Resources Dracula Map Viewer

item.title: Assignment One - Textbuffer
item.description: The first assignment for this course was to implement an ADT that would be able to store, and modify lines of text in it.
